purpose: The email announces the IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024) scheduled for July 24–26, 2024, in Melbourne, Australia. It provides important dates for paper submissions and notifications, as well as details about the conference's focus on the integration of AI and IoT technologies. The email invites authors to submit original papers on various topics related to AIoT and outlines the paper submission process and formatting requirements.
evidence_sentences: IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024)
The IEEE AIoT Conference aims to explore the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies into the Internet of Things (IoT) systems and devices.
Authors are cordially invited to submit their original papers within the eHealth area.
Perspective authors are invited to submit their papers using EDAS.
